translations: vi.达到顶点（culminate 的过去式和过去分词）
vt.以……为高潮、顶点（culminate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: They had an argument, which culminated in Tom getting drunk.
sentences.translation: 他们发生了争论，结果导致汤姆喝醉了酒。

sentences.sentence: The countercoup culminated in "31 March Incident".
This culminated in a bid by one of the world’s biggest diversified miners, BHP Billiton, for another, Rio Tinto, in November 2007.
sentences.translation: 此种情况在2007年世界最大的多样化经营矿业巨头----必和必拓(BHP Billiton)竞购另一巨头力拓(Rio Tinto)时达到顶峰。
